Forked DbgHelp.h as is from the Wine project (this header is LGPL)
http://cvs.winehq.org/cvsweb/~checkout~/wine/include/dbghelp.h

Forked Guiddef.h from the mingw-64 project (this header is public domain)
http://sourceforge.net/apps/trac/mingw-w64/browser/trunk/mingw-w64-headers/include/guiddef.h
-> Replaced all occurences of __LONG32 by long
